# amalitech-design-system



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute             | Description                                                       | Type      | Default    |
| ------------------ | --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------- |
| `autoClose`        | `auto-close`          | Auto Close Enables the auto close functionality                   | `boolean` | `false`    |
| `callToActionText` | `call-to-action-text` | Call To Action Text Sets the call-to-action text                  | `string`  | `''`       |
| `closeSecs`        | `close-secs`          | Sets the duration before the snackbar closes                      | `number`  | `10`       |
| `closeable`        | `closeable`           | Closeable Shows a close button if true                            | `boolean` | `false`    |
| `href`             | `href`                | href attribute Sets the url of the snackbar                       | `string`  | `''`       |
| `rounded`          | `rounded`             | Rounded Sets the border radius of the snackbar to round or square | `boolean` | `false`    |
| `snackbarText`     | `snackbar-text`       | Snackbar text Sets the Snackbar text                              | `string`  | `''`       |
| `target`           | `target`              | target attribute specifies how to open the url of the snackbar    | `string`  | `'_blank'` |


## Events

| Event    | Description                                            | Type               |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `closed` | This event is emitted when the close button is clicked | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                 | Description                   |
| -------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| `--background-color` | Background color of the alert |
| `--color`            | Text color of the alert       |
| `--font-family`      | Font family of the alert text |
| `--font-size`        | Font size of the alert text   |
| `--font-weight`      | Font weight of the alert text |
| `--padding-bottom`   | Padding bottom of the alert   |
| `--padding-left`     | Padding left of the alert     |
| `--padding-right`    | Padding right of the alert    |
| `--padding-top`      | Padding top of the alert      |
